text:
"Vice" is a 2018 American biographical comedy-drama movie written and directed by Adam McKay. The movie stars Christian Bale as Dick Cheney, with Amy Adams, Steve Carell, Sam Rockwell, Tyler Perry, Alison Pill, and Jesse Plemons in supporting roles.
The movie is about Cheney in his desire to become the most powerful Vice President in America's history. "Vice" was released in the United States on December 25, 2018, by Annapurna Pictures.
